name: Chip (itch) (Kooky)
description:
A short, atmospheric interactive fiction about discovering a lost abandoned robot with a special ability. Will the two of you become best friends... forever?

INSTRUCTIONS:

Extract everything into a folder, and run Chip.exe to play. Use your mouse to click on stuff (you can also use arrows + enter/space if you prefer). I HIGHLY recommend to have your audio on!

Game jam entry.

I decided to see if I could make this game entirely in AutoHotKey, to try something new. I also provide the source code. It's quite messy.

BUGFIX: Incorrect image scaling is now fixed.

1 team member.
